alert.note: Alert for Jones; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 9:02PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jones and northwestern Taylor Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 902 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Merkel, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Merkel, Tye, Trent, View, Caps, Dyess Afb and Stith. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 261 and 281. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
